bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
